actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to protect beneficiaries with limb loss and other orthopedic conditions by providing access to appropriate, safe, effective, patient-centered orthotic and prosthetic care, to reduce fraud, waste, and abuse with respect to orthotics and prosthetics, and for other purposes.
short_title: Medicare Orthotics and Prosthetics Patient-Centered Care Act

titles.title: Medicare Orthotics and Prosthetics Patient-Centered Care Act
Medicare Orthotics and Prosthetics Patient-Centered Care Act

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to protect beneficiaries with limb loss and other orthopedic conditions by providing access to appropriate, safe, effective, patient-centered orthotic and prosthetic care, to reduce fraud, waste, and abuse with respect to orthotics and prosthetics, and for other purposes.
